name: author
title: Author
description: Normalised and structured authors that can be referred to by names, references and taxon scrutinizers. All entities also allow to specify a modifedBy field which must reference an Author identifier here.

fields.name: ID
fields.title: ID
fields.description: Unique identifier for the author / person. Can be referenced from any modifiedBy field.

fields.name: sourceID
fields.title: sourceID
fields.description: Optional identifier for the source this record came from as listed in the metadata.yaml

fields.name: alternativeID
fields.title: alternativeID
fields.description: A comma concatenated list of alternative identifiers for the author. Every alternative identifier must be in the form of scope:id. See identifiers for all details and common scopes. Recommended identifier scopes for authors are orcid, ipni, wikidata & viaf.

fields.name: given
fields.title: given
fields.description: List of given names, concatenated by a comma.

fields.name: family
fields.title: family
fields.description: The family name including any leading particles if existing.

fields.name: suffix
fields.title: suffix
fields.description: Optional suffix to distinguish persons with identical surnames. In well known cases of father and son, the son should be distinguished by ‘f.’ or ‘filius’ in the suffix.

fields.name: abbreviationBotany
fields.title: abbreviationBotany
fields.description: Standard form (official abbreviation) of the persons name for use in a botanical author citation.

fields.name: alternativeNames
fields.title: alternativeNames
fields.description: A | separated list of alternative names this person is known under.

fields.name: sex
fields.title: sex
fields.description: Biological sex of the person.

fields.name: country
fields.title: country
fields.description: Country of citizenship. Preferably as ISO code. If multiple concatenated by a comma.

fields.name: birth
fields.title: birth
fields.description: Date of birth, given as an ISO date string.

fields.name: birthPlace
fields.title: birthPlace
fields.description: Location the person was born at.

fields.name: death
fields.title: death
fields.description: Date of death, given as an ISO date string.

fields.name: affiliation
fields.title: affiliation
fields.description: Institution(s) the author is affiliated with.

fields.name: interest
fields.title: interest
fields.description: List of taxonomic groups the person has worked on.

fields.name: referenceID
fields.title: referenceID
fields.description: List of sources where the information was taken from or further information can be found about the author.

fields.name: link
fields.title: link
fields.description: A link to a webpage provided by the source depicting the author.

fields.name: remarks
fields.title: remarks
fields.description: Remarks about the person.

fields.name: modified
fields.title: modified
fields.description: UTC timestamp in ISO format to represent the time the record was last modified.

fields.name: modifiedBy
fields.title: modifiedBy
fields.description: Author identifier indicating the person who has last modified the record.
